cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 130 miles SSE of Mobile, Alabama
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest across the north-central Gulf of Mexico toward the Mississippi–Alabama coastline and then inland toward the lower Mississippi Valley
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Mississippi–Alabama border (around the mouth of the Pearl River)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch west of Shell Beach LA to the Mouth of the Mississippi River and east of Dauphin Island AL to Navarre FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from the Mouth of the Pearl River to the Alabama-Florida border; Tropical Storm Warning west of the Mouth of the Pearl River to Grand Isle LA and from the Alabama-Florida border to the Okaloosa–Walton County line FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: north-central Gulf Coast including southeast Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, and the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Outer rainbands may bring occasional gusts below tropical-storm force; sustained damaging winds are not expected at Manatee County Port.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; surge values of concern are limited to the north-central Gulf Coast well west of the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: Periodic showers possible, but significant accumulation (>4 in) is unlikely.
